item.description:
The 2010 national 5th annual LFOD Rally August 27,28,29 will be the best year yet with many new features and topic's. The LFOD Rally is the only all free true first amendment event in the U.S.

2010 FEATURES TO DATE:

* 40+ National & State Organizations
* 10 Cannons spectator participation revolutionary battle
* 20 benefit bands of redress
* 16 National & Local renown speakers
* Appleseed Project two-day rifle marksmanship clinic and Revolutionary War history course.
Beginner to advanced. Info or to register: nh@appleseedinfo.org
* Cannons & Fireworks grand finale
* Horse drawn Carraige rides
* Laser Show
* Camping spots
* Exhibitors tables & booth spots
* Food & Beverage's available
* More to be announced

2010 TOPICS TO DATE:

* U.S. & N.H. Constitutional enforcement
* Second Amendment rights
* National I.D. & Spychips
* Federal Reserve transparency
* Reduce Government
* Stop the NWO, NAU & CFR Charter's
* I.R.S. Reform
* Out of control deficits
* Sound money legislation
* Restore the republic
* End the Federal Reserve
* Religious rights
* NH Motto Preservation
* Excessive taxation
* No Helmets Rights Advocacy
* Monadnock Zone Preservation
* More to be announced

2010 SCHEDULE & LOCATIONS:

Wednesday August 25th:
12 - 6 PM: Dillon Lodge / Sawyer's Field: Early arrival's & set up.
6 - 11 PM: Dillon Lodge: Music, meetings, group barbecue.
Thursday August 26th:
6 - 8 AM: Dillon Lodge: C.Y.O. breakfast with coffee
8 AM - 5 PM: Monadnock Rod & Gun Club: R.W.V.A. Appleseed Project safety & educational shoot
5 - 7 PM: Dillon Lodge/ Sawyer's Field: Exhibits, Alt Expo, barbecue, activity's.
7 - 11 PM: Dillon Lodge: Acoustical Music
Friday August 27th:
6 - 8 AM: Dillon Lodge: C.Y.O. breakfast with coffee at Dillon Lodge
8 AM - 5 PM: Monadnock Rod & Gun Club: R.W.V.A. Appleseed Project safety & educational shoot
5 - 7 PM: Dillon Lodge/Sawyer's Field: Barbecue, exhibits, Alt.Expo, activity's & more .
6 PM - 11 PM: Dillon Lodge 6 bands of redress concert

*SATURDAY AUGUST 28th MAIN EVENT'S & RALLY'S*:
9 AM - 3 PM: JAFFREY COMMON: Speakers, Vendors, Exhibitors, Cannons and Music and more.
3 PM - 6 PM: SILVER RANCH: 10 cannons revolutionary reenactors and spectator participation battle.
6PM - 12 AM: DILLON LODGE: Fireworks & cannons Grand Finale, 6 bands, laser show, exhibitors & more.

Sunday August 29th:
8 - 10 AM Dillon Lodge: C.Y.O. breakfast & coffee
9 AM - 1 PM Dillon Lodge: Music, Exhibits, hangovers & more.
1 - 5 PM All venue's: Pack up & Clean up

2010 MAP OF EVENTS & LOCATIONS:
http://www.facebook.c....
Jaffrey Common, 1 North St., Jaffrey,NH,03452
Dillon Lodge & Sawyers Field, 267 Old Sharon Road, Jaffrey,NH,03452
Silver Ranch, 183 Turnpike Road, Jaffrey NH,03452

TO RESERVE AT FACEBOOK:
http://www.facebook.c....

LODGING CLOSEST TO EVENTS:
Benjamin Prescott Inn
http://www.benjaminpr...

LODGINGS & DINING IN MONADNOCK REGION:
http://www.southwestn...

THINGS TO KNOW:
* Attending LFOD Rally does not signify support or opposition to all or any of the topic's or exhibits.
* Open carry is legal in NH and is allowed at all venue locations.
* BYOB at Dillon Lodge and camping area. Please, no alcohol at Silver Ranch or The Jaffrey Common.
* This is an all outdoor event. No power or water hook up's provided. Participant's urged to bring canopy's, lantern's, chair's,etc.
* ALL food concession's vendor's have been booked. Unlimited exhibitor spot's available. Exhibitor's must provide their own tables.
* Exhibitors for main event at Jaffrey Common are to be set up by 9 AM Saturday August 28th.
* Exhibitor spots also available at Dillon Lodge Friday 12 PM - 11 PM & Saturday 6 PM - 11 PM.
* Alcohol or Drug abuse is not welcomed or tolerated.
* Camping for tents is at Dillon Lodge. Grille's, C&C running showers, water spicket, porto potty's all provided, No open fires.
* R.V. spots are limited and must be self contained. NO power or septic hook ups. Central water spicket available.
* ALL participant's are responsible to keep and leave all venue's clean!!
* Donation's of $5 per person, $10 per exhibitor spot, $20 per camp spot to offset costs will be appreciated.
* More you need and should know:
http://www.facebook.c...
OR: http://forum.nhlibert...

SPECIAL CONTRIBUTORS:

Transit Music Group Productions, Candia,NH
http://transitmusicgr...
Captain Morrill's Revolutionary Artillery Company, Franklin, NH
http://www.captainmor...
Atlas Fireworks Pyrotechnic's, Jaffrey,NH
http://www.atlaspyro....
R.W.V.A. Appleseed Project rifle safety educational rifle shoot
http://www.appleseedi...
Feel Good Farm & Lyneborough Porto Privie's, Lyndeborough,NH
http://feelgoodfarmin...
Savron Graphic's & Printing, Jaffrey,NH
http://www.savron.com...

FOR RESERVATIONS OR INFO:
caacp01@aol.com , 603-532-6711 , POB 736, Jaffrey, N.H. , 03452
